summary: RemusDEX is a fully on-chain, permissionless Central Limit Order Book (CLOB) decentralized exchange (DEX) on Starknet. It aims to integrate Bitcoin liquidity into DeFi, offering features like precise limit orders, deep liquidity, and spot leverage. The project is open-source, audited, and has already launched on the Starknet mainnet. It plans to use grant funds to enhance user experience, expand trading pairs, and increase user activity.
review: The RemusDEX project presents a compelling case for funding, aligning well with the round's focus on open-source dApps that enhance Web3 accessibility and usability. The project is innovative, being the first fully on-chain CLOB DEX on Starknet, and it integrates Bitcoin liquidity, which is a significant untapped market. The project's commitment to open-source principles and its transparent development process are commendable. However, the application could benefit from more detailed information on community involvement and environmental sustainability, which are key aspects of the model specification.

strengths.title: Innovative Use of Technology
strengths.description: RemusDEX is the first fully on-chain CLOB DEX on Starknet, offering features like precise limit orders and deep liquidity, which differentiate it from traditional AMMs.

strengths.title: Integration of Bitcoin Liquidity
strengths.description: The project aims to integrate Bitcoin liquidity into DeFi, tapping into a significant market and enhancing the ecosystem's growth potential.

strengths.title: Commitment to Open-Source Principles
strengths.description: The project adheres to open-source principles, with transparent smart contracts and publicly accessible audit reports.

weaknesses.title: Lack of Community Involvement Details
weaknesses.description: The application lacks detailed information on how the project involves the community in decision-making processes, which is crucial for fostering inclusive systemic change.

weaknesses.title: Limited Environmental Sustainability Focus
weaknesses.description: The application does not address environmental sustainability, which is an important consideration in the model specification.

changes.title: Enhance Community Involvement
changes.description: Provide more details on how the project involves the community in its development and decision-making processes.

changes.title: Address Environmental Sustainability
changes.description: Include information on how the project considers environmental sustainability in its operations and development.
